ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to let you know, Iron Raptor, all the consoles in the Alliancebase outside the bridge or Zardus hand comp are disabled, and have been for quite a while.

Just to let you know, Iron Raptor, all the consoles in the Alliancebase 
outside the bridge or Zardus' hand comp are disabled, and have been for quite 
a while.

::Prowl/Reptilica::

Prowl frowns as he sees Iron Raptor walk over to a corner, watching her as 
she does something at a console in the corner, his frown relaxing as he looks 
at her, for a second forgetting their mission. He shakes his head, blinking 
and looking at her as she turns back around. His eyes widen as he hears her 
say 'lead them out', realizing she didn't mean herself too. His eyesbrow 
raises at the words 'her Maximals'.

"No," he says after a few seconds, "You have to come with us. I can't get us 
out if they capture you," his voice had a pleading quality to it. He pauses, 
opening his mouth again to speak, "I-" he's interrupted by Arcangel's message 
on his comm-link followed by some shocks and the sound of gunfire.

"NO!" he replies, "Get out of here! Retreat out of their scanning range! 
That's an order. Please."

Prowl spins around as Oinker walks in, stopping right near him. Without 
hesitation, Prowl swings his claw weapon at Oinker's head, attempting to do 
the same to him as he had done to Nemesis.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica growls, walking down a hallway. He glances down at his scanner, his 
eyes widening as he sees that there were now dozens of Maximals running 
around, all with the same four signatures. He nearly yells out in rage, 
continuing toward the torture chambers as he hears a message on his comm, a 
message on a Maximal frequency.

"Computer, track transmission."

He looks down at the results on the scanner. He had that dang Maximal now.....

Reptilica continues toward the torture chambers.
